#include <iostream>
#include<bitset>
#include<math.h>
#define ull unsigned long long
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		ull n,sum=0;
		int count=0;
		cin>>n;
		int a[21];
		 ull temp=n;
		 while(temp!=0)
		 {
		 	a[count]=temp%10;
		 	temp=temp/10;
		 	count++;
		 }
		   for(int i=0;i<count;i++)
		   {  sum=sum+a[i]*(pow(2,i));}
		   sum=sum+1;
		    ull trm=sum;
		      int b[20];
		      ull c1=0;
		      while(trm!=0)
		      {
		         b[c1]=trm%2;
		         trm=trm/2;
		         c1++;
		      }
		      for(int i=c1-1;i>=0;i--)
		         cout<<b[i];
		         cout<<"\n";

	}
	return 0;
}
